select
distinct
from tb_user_apply
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.update:
update tb_user_apply
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
